title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server that lets you pull, run, and manage large language models locally with a single command.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API—chat, generate, embed, pull, and list models from Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library exposing all Ollama endpoints; chat, stream, embeddings, model management.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that adds Ollama models as LLM and chat components for chains, agents, and RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web interface for Ollama (chat UI, model manager, multi-user, dark mode, OpenAI-compatible endpoint).

title: ollama-rag
summary: Lightweight retrieval-augmented-generation example using Ollama + SentenceTransformers + FAISS.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings Ollama models into the editor as a free, private GitHub Copilot alternative.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent API, streaming, and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI for Ollama with chat history, prompt templates, and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that exposes Ollama models to servers via slash commands with per-user rate limits.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama-nest
summary: Community-maintained NestJS module that injects Ollama service with decorators for chat, embed, and model ops.

title: ollama-dart
summary: Dart/Flutter package for talking to Ollama; useful for desktop/mobile apps that need private LLM access.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client for Ollama’s REST API with tokio/hyper.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama supporting chat, generation, embeddings, and model management in C#/F#.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds Ollama-powered AI commands for summarizing notes, brainstorming, and translation.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot integration for Ollama with app mentions, DM support, and configurable system prompts.

title: ollama-telegram
summary: Telegram bot using Ollama as backend; supports group chats, voice transcription, and per-chat model selection.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration offering OllamaGenerator and OllamaEmbedder nodes for building local NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-ray
summary: Ray Serve example deploying Ollama models for scalable online serving with autoscaling and batching.
